Rendell's Message❤️

Palak palak palak

Nahi naam koi alag

Bohot common sa naam

But na common si ladki

Metha kadwa sach

Sara muh pe hai bolti


Na tede medhe raste

Bolneke tarike meh

But bohot zyada uljhan

Jene ke salike meh


Par kuch bhi bol yara

Tu bandi bohot sahi hai

Shayad mera hi kuch punya

Tere jaisi dost paee hai


Agar covid na hota

Toh aaj sath meh dhamal masti

Karra happy birthday wish

Tu huee aaj bis(20) ki
